      • showSVGProgressDialog

        public static void showSVGProgressDialog(@NonNull
                                         android.content.Context context,
                                         java.lang.Integer timeoutInMilliseconds)
        Shows an SVG Dialog. Overloaded for only context needed
        Parameters:
        context - context
        timeoutInMilliseconds - timeout in milliseconds. If null, will default to 5 seconds. If <0, indefinite

      • showSVGProgressDialog

        public static void showSVGProgressDialog(@NonNull
                                         android.content.Context context,
                                         boolean dismissible,
                                         java.lang.Integer timeoutInMilliseconds,
                                         java.lang.Integer imageSizeX,
                                         java.lang.Integer imageSizeY,
                                         java.lang.String[] svgArray,
                                         int[] svgColors,
                                         int[] svgTraceColors)
        Builds an SVG Progress Dialog and shows it. For more detailed param info, see PGMacCustomProgressBar
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        dismissible - Is cancellable progress bar or not
        timeoutInMilliseconds - timeout in milliseconds. If null, will default to 5 seconds. If <0, indefinite
        imageSizeX - Size of the SVG Image (x - width)
        imageSizeY - Size of the SVG Image (y - height)
        svgArray - The array of SVG Strings. If null, it will default to the spinning circle
        svgColors - The array of svg colors. SIZE MUST MATCH THE SIZE OF THE ARRAY OF SVG STRINGS!
        svgTraceColors - The array of svg tracing colors. SIZE MUST MATCH THE SIZE OF THE ARRAY OF SVG STRINGS!

      • showElasticDialog

        public static void showElasticDialog(android.content.Context context,

      • dismissProgressDialog

        public static void dismissProgressDialog(java.lang.String message)
        Dismiss the progress dialog with a toast
        Parameters:
        message - The message String to toast

      • isDialogShowing

        public static boolean isDialogShowing()
        Quick method for determining whether or not the dialog is showing. Useful for onStop calls
        Returns:
        boolean, true if it is showing, false if it is not or is null.
